data.title: Hotels Near Zurich
data.meta_description: Discover a Rapperswil hotel offering traditional hospitality in a prime location. Hotel Speer is in the heart of Rapperswil and just 35 minutes from Zurich.
data.text:
Along the lake by our Sorell bikes

Would you like to do some sports, not care about timetables and traffic jams or just explore the region on two wheels? Then the free Sorell bikes are the right thing for you. Not only do they get you from A to B quickly, but you can also go on a discovery tour of the surrounding area or air your head a little after a long working day. What are you waiting for: On the bikes, ready, go.

Information on availability can be obtained on site from the hotel staff.

The best four star hotel on the square

The Sorell Hotel Speer has it all. Located in the middle of the charming Old Town of Rapperswil, with its historic exterior and modern interior, this hotel impresses its guests with its top service and in vogue restaurants. Whether you are visiting on business, as a family or a couple, you are sure to feel right at home here. The substantial old walls give the hotel an air of silent safety, dependability and calm, while the modern interior pampers to your every need.

If your job involves travelling then you will truly value the hotel’s personal atmosphere and good links to the region. The city of Zurich and its airport are just 35 minutes away. As hotel guests take a stroll through the Old Town, they soon realise that the real advantages of this hotel are right on its doorstep: The castle, lake and shopping are just a few steps away.

Rapperswil unites all that Switzerland is renowned for in just one small area: An historic Old Town, a deep blue lake and the mountains just a stone's throw away. In addition to all this there is an ever-growing array of cultural and sports activities to choose from, such as the annual blues'n'jazz festival. Click through our themed packages. The Sorell Hotel Speer offers families with children, golfers, culture lovers and wellness fans some very interesting combination deals.

Say yes! The castle, the rose gardens, the lake and the mountains create the perfect setting for the most beautiful day in the world: your wedding day. Maybe enjoy an aperitif on the island of Ufenau, go cruising on Lake Zurich or have a party in the castle hall. Whatever you choose to do, your day will be the best day if it starts and ends in the Sorell Hotel Speer, Rapperswil.

Read more

Five room categories to satisfy all our guests

The Sorell Hotel Speer has 56 rooms divided into five categories adapted to all the living and sleeping needs of our guests. Our suite with a rooftop terrace is perfect for a romantic wedding night, but also perfectly suitable for a family who would like more space and comfort. Guests can choose between twin beds or a queen-size bed.

All rooms contain features of a high standard of living. These include air conditioning, HD TV with direct Internet access and a selection of 150 channels, minibar, safe, hair dryer, bathtub and shower bathrooms as well as free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

Non-smoking property: At the request of our customers, but also for legal reasons, smoking is not permitted in the hotel. For those of our guests who still want to smoke, we have rooms with balconies.

Child policy: Per adult, one child up to 12 years may stay free of charge in the bed with their parents

Pets allowed: Fee of CHF 10.- per day

Restaurant Sayori

At lunchtime, the Sayori offers a wide range of reasonably priced menus. In the evening, it turns into a romantic, stylish restaurant serving Japanese, Chinese and Thai cuisine. The separate sushi bar offers a large selection of fresh sushi and sashimi dishes.

Mojo Bar & Lounge

The Trend-Bar for trendsetters in Rapperswil. The modern, elegant décor and the variety of drinks make guests feel very welcome. Enjoy a glass of fine wine or a refined cocktail in a relaxed atmosphere. The selection ranges from Americano to White Russian - what more could you possibly want? Enjoy your Mojo!
